text:
わざわざ vital のテストを回したいので .vimspec を .vim に変換する方法を教えてくれって聞いてきましたからね…(それで知った)
<https://github.com/thinca/vim-themis/issues/52>

attachments.fallback: GitHub: Does any command convert vimspec to normal vim script · Issue #52 · thinca/vim-themis
attachments.title: Does any command convert vimspec to normal vim script · Issue #52 · thinca/vim-themis
attachments.text: In the help doc says, ".vimspec" files will be converted to vim script, but how to save the converted ".vim" file?
